title: How to Open Map More Easily
content: Looking for ways to open the game map more easily on PC, similar to PS5 touchpad. Can I change this in settings? Got help and now it's solved! Hope these tips help others too!

comments.author: #FE73
comments.content: Usually you can assign map opening to arrow keys in controller settings. Keyboard users should be similar.

comments.author: #8F55
comments.content: Just reassign controller keys in settings. Left or right D-pad buttons are usually free and perfect for map shortcuts.
Try pressing 'M' key? Maps are usually 'M' by default.

comments.author: #A44D
comments.content: Totally agree. Having a quick way to access maps directly without menus would be great. No direct shortcut is really annoying.

title: [PC Version] Stellar Blade [MOD] Part5
content: PC version Stellar Blade MOD discussion thread on 5ch

comments.content: Gigas came back but can't beat it even with alpha cores?
The Gigas from side quests was the hardest boss I struggled with

comments.author: #CC80
comments.content: Not 14700 but with 5080 you'll lack performance. Without DLSS, unless it's 5090, getting 144fps will be tough right?

title: Don't forget to take the selfie BEFORE opening the crate.
content: Be sure to take selfies with fish before opening fish boxes!

comments.author: #746E
comments.content: Actually you can take selfies after opening boxes too. Even if boxes are slightly blocking, as long as fish are visible it's fine. I confirmed this personally.

comments.author: #ABA6
comments.content: I opened boxes first too and had no issues taking photos.

comments.author: #21E4
comments.content: Possible but definitely more annoying.

title: Which one is the best weapon for Maelle between those two?
content: Wondering what's the optimal weapon for Maelle - between Lithium and Medallium, which is more effective?

comments.author: #FE73
comments.content: If you're going for quick one-turn kills, Medallium is ideal. You can immediately enter Virtue stance and save turns. But in longer battles where you can't finish enemies immediately, Lithium maintains Virtue stance and preserves marks for sustained damage, making it shine.

comments.author: #8F55
comments.content: I'm leaning toward Lithium. Especially in solo or duo Maelle builds that prioritize speed reduction and weakening marks. Plus removing initiative attacks allows maintaining Virtue stance on all counters and turns.

title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - 5ch Thread
content: Looking at 5ch threads about Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, there are various opinions.

comments.author: ParryMaster
comments.content: I understand parrying is important, but could they make the timing easier to understand?

comments.author: #4BC9
comments.content: If you're going to lower difficulty with mods, they should adjust it in the main game.

title: red screen during some cinematics
content: Having an issue where red screens appear during some cinematics in the game. How can I fix this?

comments.author: #5BDD
comments.content: I had screen tearing issues both in-game and on character screens, but clean installing NVIDIA graphics drivers fixed it.

comments.author: 33Master
comments.content: I'm having this issue too, but NVIDIA driver updates don't seem to work.

title: What does secret model mean?
content: Curious about what 'Secret Model' means in Deluxe Season 3. What exactly does it mean, and is it rarer than other items?

comments.author: #746E
comments.content: Yes, it's definitely rarer than other rare items.
Don't really use decorations much, but that dragon decoration looks really cool.

comments.author: #AD61
comments.content: It does look really cool. My main question was just about rarity.

title: LOL, all i do is die
content: Seriously, am I the only one who can't get the hang of Warfare mode? Unless I'm sniping from long range, I always lose in 1v1 gunfights, and when I rush, I die without exception. Everyone else seems faster and less jittery than me. I honestly can't believe I'm this bad. In Operations, gunfights require more strategy and skill, so I'm pretty good unlike most people who play like Call of Duty. But Warfare? I'm really terrible.

comments.author: WeaponExpert
comments.content: It's tough when the enemy team is full of snipers, most of my matches are like that. Plus this game's hit registration and netcode don't seem very good.

comments.author: FPSPro
comments.content: You're not the only one; everyone (except hackers and streamers using soft hacks) keeps dying and barely gets one or two kills.
